original_title: Bat El Drinking Water and Other Signs
overview: (Maybe) of finding neutral signs in a non-neutral place while tension sits, increases, is shared, builds, or possibly lessensâ€“or maybe is placed elsewhere for a while. Some birds move easily across, from above. You can hear them all over and the breeze that follows feels important. It comes when it wants, breaks up a heat, pauses something, and interrupts without being seen.
title: Bat El Drinking Water and Other Signs
